amendatorysection.para: The Department of Agriculture, in participating in a cooperative federal-state-rancher rangeland grasshopper control program authorized under sections 2-1068 to 2-1070, may enter into such contracts as may be necessary to effectively accomplish the control activities including, but not necessarily limited to, contracts for the spraying of insecticides or other control measures, contracts for the purchase of needed materials and equipment, contracts for the transportation or storage of needed materials and equipment, and contracts with participating ranchers.
